      • isWebEnabled

        public boolean isWebEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the administrator of this registry instance has explicitly enable the web of registries functionality

      • isValidWebPartner

        public boolean isValidWebPartner(String partnerId,
                        String apiKey)
        Parameters:
        partnerId - unique identifier for web partner
        apiKey - authentication key known only to this partner
        Returns:
        true if partner identified by the id is determined to be a valid web of registries partner for part transfer based on the status and authentication key

      • addWebPartner

        public RegistryPartner addWebPartner(String userId,
                            RegistryPartner partner)
        Adds the registry instance specified by the url to the list of existing partners (if not already in there)
        Parameters:
        userId - id of user performing action (must have admin privs)
        partner - registry partner object that contains unique uniform resource identifier for the registry
        Returns:
        add partner ofr

      • removeWebPartner

        partnerUrl - url identifier for partner

      • updateWebPartner

      • setEnable

        public ArrayList<RegistryPartner> setEnable(String url,
                                   boolean enable)
                                     throws ControllerException
        Enables or disables web of registries (WoR) functionality and contacts the node master (if this system is not it) with request to join the web of registries.

        If enabling web of registries, a task is started in a separate thread to contact each of the registries in the WoR configuration for authentication keys and to provide them with the same when making requests to this server

        Parameters:
        url - this site's url
        enable - if true, enables WoR; disables it otherwise
        Returns:
        list of received partners if WoR functionality is being enabled, is successful and this is not the master node, otherwise it just returns an empty list, or null in the event of an exception
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • getAuthenticationKey

        public String getAuthenticationKey(String url)
                            throws ControllerException
        Retrieves the stored authentication key for the server specified in the parameter. If no key exists, one is generated and stored
        Parameters:
        url - remote registry identifier
        Returns:
        generated authentication key or null if the server is not in the list
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • getWebPartner

        public RegistryPartner getWebPartner(String userId,
                            long partnerId)

      • getApiKey

        public String getApiKey(String url)
                 throws ControllerException
        Retrieves the stored api key for the server specified in the parameter and the server status is approved
        Parameters:
        url - remote registry identifier
        Returns:
        stored api key if one exists
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • setApiKeyForPartner

        public void setApiKeyForPartner(String url,
                       String apiKey)
                         throws ControllerException
        Associates the api key specified with the registry instance. This key is generated on and received from the remote registry
        Parameters:
        url - remote registry identifier
        apiKey - authentication key to be used when communicating with the remote registry.
        Throws:
        ControllerException
